items.title: Awesome Code Review
items.content_text:
### Articles

items.title: Awesome React Native
items.content_text:
### Utilities / Navigation Demos

*   [upgrade-helper ★398 (⭐3.9k)](https://github.com/react-native-community/upgrade-helper) - ⚛️ A web interface to support React Native developers in upgrading their apps. [Link to tool](https://react-native-community.github.io/upgrade-helper)
*   [rn-diff-purge ★64 (⭐1.3k)](https://github.com/react-native-community/rn-diff-purge) - The easiest way to upgrade React Native versions. You can find diffs for every React Native version, that are created by diffing the previous version with a newly created app in the new version.

### Seeds / Navigation Demos

*   [react-native-template-airbnb (⭐14)](https://github.com/iboldurev/react-native-template-airbnb) - Clean and minimalist React Native template for a quick start with Airbnb (Flow, Prettier).
items.content_html:
Utilities / Navigation Demos

  • upgrade-helper ★398 (⭐3.9k) - ⚛️ A web interface to support React Native developers in upgrading their apps. Link to tool
  • rn-diff-purge ★64 (⭐1.3k) - The easiest way to upgrade React Native versions. You can find diffs for every React Native version, that are created by diffing the previous version with a newly created app in the new version.

Seeds / Navigation Demos

  • react-native-template-airbnb (⭐14) - Clean and minimalist React Native template for a quick start with Airbnb (Flow, Prettier).

items.title: Awesome Cpp
items.content_text:
### Configuration

*   [inih (⭐2.7k)](https://github.com/benhoyt/inih) - Simple .INI file parser in C, good for embedded systems. \[BSD-3-Clause]
*   [inih (⭐444)](https://github.com/jtilly/inih) - Single header only C++ version of [inih (⭐2.7k)](https://github.com/benhoyt/inih). \[BSD-3-Clause]
*   [libconfuse (⭐494)](https://github.com/martinh/libconfuse) - Small configuration file parser library for C. \[ISC]
*   [simpleini (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/brofield/simpleini) - Cross-platform C++ library providing a simple API to read and write INI-style configuration files. \[MIT]

### Graphics

*   [LLGL (⭐2.3k)](https://github.com/LukasBanana/LLGL) - Low Level Graphics Library (LLGL) is a thin abstraction layer for the modern graphics APIs. \[BSD-3-Clause]
items.content_html:
Configuration

  • inih (⭐2.7k) - Simple .INI file parser in C, good for embedded systems. [BSD-3-Clause]
  • inih (⭐444) - Single header only C++ version of inih (⭐2.7k). [BSD-3-Clause]
  • libconfuse (⭐494) - Small configuration file parser library for C. [ISC]
  • simpleini (⭐1.2k) - Cross-platform C++ library providing a simple API to read and write INI-style configuration files. [MIT]

Graphics

  • LLGL (⭐2.3k) - Low Level Graphics Library (LLGL) is a thin abstraction layer for the modern graphics APIs. [BSD-3-Clause]
